Northland: One dead in crash on State Highway 14 at Tangiteroria in Kaipara. https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-one-dead-in-crash-on-state-highway-15-at-tangiteroria-in-kaipara/IAN46VKM65C5HFCBIOYMVGS2SI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-one-dead-in-crash-on-state-highway-15-at-tangiteroria-in-kaipara/IAN46VKM65C5HFCBIOYMVGS2SI/ The highway was closed for several hours as emergency services attended the scene. Mon, 20 Jan 2025 17:53:08 +0000 The Serious Crash Unit conducted a scene examination after a fatal crash on State Highway 14 in Kaipara.

(Inset) A typical Hawke's Bay meatball in all its golden glory.
